description: A symmetrical triangle of leading ones adjusted polynomial coefficients based on Hermite orthogonal polynomials: t(n,m)=CoefficientList[HermiteH[n, x], x][[m + 1]] + Reverse[CoefficientList[ HermiteH[n, x], x]][[m + 1]] - (CoefficientList[HermiteH[n, x], x][[1]] + Reverse[CoefficientList[HermiteH[n, x], x]][[1]]) + 1
